Title: New Housing Estate
Description: The board have noticed a massive spike in the growing population, they wish to tackle this by demolishing some un-used office blocks and build a new housing estate.

Title: Electric Car Law
Description: This new law states that everyone that drives a car must purchase either a hybrid or fully electric car within the next 3 years, otherwise insurance premiums will increase significantly.

Title: New 5* Hotel
Description: A recent rise in tourism has caught the attention of the board. They have suggested to make use of an old patch of un-used grassland and construct a 5-star hotel.

Title: Littering Fines
Description: A law has been suggested to penalise people who are caught littering. The law indicates that if anyone is caught littering in the area, they will be fined on the spot of up to £240.

Title: Town Community Garden
Description: The locals have suggested creating a community garden in the centre of town. There have been complaints that the town is becoming "Increasingly Grey", so the addition of a new garden would massively boost the spirits of the locals whilst also putting some life back into the town. This project will be crowdfunded and will not have any affect over the town's overall economy.

Title: Hydroelectric Dam
Description: There has been a massive spike in energy usage recently, in response to this, the board wish to begin the construction of a hydroelectric dam across the town river to counteract these energy issues. The dam will be expensive but will eventually pay back its expenses across its lifespan.

Title: New Super Market
Description: A local supermarket chain has put forward a request to build a new store in town. However, the plans state that it will be built on land that was previously going to be environmentally restored.

Title: Artificial Beaches
Description: Due to increasing water levels the community have suggested creating an artificial beach to ensure that there is a sufficient gap between the sea water and the land.

Title: Town Hall Renovation
Description: The local town hall needs a lick of paint, it won't be costly and will make the locals much happier.

Title: Wind Turbines
Description: The board have suggested adding wind turbines to the north of the town in order to create a renewable energy source.

Title: Gentrification Plan
Description: The board have suggested a plan of gentrification by giving older buildings a new coat of paint to make the town look more appealing to outsiders.

Title: New Offices
Description: Due to computer-based jobs becoming the norm in the modern era, the board have suggested constructing new office buildings in the town centre.

Title: Energy Efficient Streetlights
Description: The board have suggested replacing the current streetlights with new energy-efficient streetlights. However, these new streetlights are far dimmer than the old ones and it will most likely enrage the locals.

Title: New Trainline
Description: There has been a suggestion by the board to add a new train line as a way of making the town more accessible, allowing for an increase in tourism.

Title: Speed Bumps
Description: Due to a string of accidents that occur on a few key roads around the town, the community have come together to suggest some new speed bumps to decrease the speed of drivers and keep the roads safer.

Title: Sea Wall
Description: In response to the rising sea level, the board have introduced a plan to create a seawall that should halt the progression of rising seawater for several decades. However, the project is very expensive, and people take issue with it as they like the seaside views and don't want that taken away from them.

Title: New Museum
Description: The community feel that there needs to be some way of portraying the history of the town. In response to this, the community would like to create a museum that celebrates the history. The building will be very expensive but will increase the local's happiness and potentially boost the economy through new tourists.

Title: Park Renovation
Description: The towns park has recently gone into a state of degradation due to mistreatment and mismanagement. The community have sent in a proposal to renovate the park to make it more appealing.

Title: New Dual Carriageway
Description: In order to reduce the amount of traffic on the roads, the board have proposed a new dual carriageway to replace a single lane road.

Title: Solar Farm
Description: Due to the towns rising energy cost, the board have suggested implementing a Solar Farm. The farm will be initially expensive, but its raw energy output should allow the farm to pay for itself in a few years of service where it will then continue to provide free energy to the town.

Title: Church Roof Repair
Description: The church is one of the oldest buildings in the town, it has had a roof leak for numerous weeks. It will be expensive to fix but is an essential part of town for many of the locals.

Title: New Restaurant
Description: A new restaurant has been proposed by the board as a way of boosting the local economy and increasing the amount of tourism.

Title: New School Buildings
Description: The community have suggested creating some new school buildings and adding some new equipment to said buildings. This is to give the next generation of students a more appealing workspace as well as giving the children access to technology that they will be using for the rest of lives and giving them a head start on how to use said technology.

Title: Energy Efficient Boilers
Description: A plan has been suggested to implement an energy-efficient boiler in each and every home. This will put less of a strain on energy companies but will be extremely costly.

Title: New Bike Lanes
Description: The community have suggested adding dedicated bike lanes to the town. This project should reduce traffic throughout the town and promote a more athletic lifestyle for the townsfolk.

Title: New Sports Centre
Description: The board have suggested adding a sports centre to the town. The project will be expensive, but its predicted usage should allow for the building to pay itself back several times over. However, the building will take up a lot of room and may disturb several ecosystems due to its creation.

Title: More Outside Bins
Description: The community wish for more bins across the town to counteract littering and overall making the town look more appealing.

Title: Public Library Renovation
Description: The public library is building that is commonly used by the townsfolk that is currently in a state of disrepair. There is a proposal to renovate the library so that new equipment will be added to it and the building will look more appealing to a younger generation.

Title: New Shopping Centre
Description: A shopping centre has been suggested by the board. There is a lack of choice when it comes to shopping in the area. A new shopping centre would most definitely boost the economy and make the locals happy.

Title: Electric Buses
Description: A proposal has come forward to replace every bus in town with a 100% electric bus. This would be incredibly beneficial for the environment.
